intro: Play upgraded, more difficult versions of familiar minigames to your heart's content! Are you up to the challenge? Are you ready...for THOSE GAMES EXTREME?!
description:
THOSE GAMES are now more challenging and more fun than ever!
Play upgraded, harder versions of minigames from THOSE GAMES 1 and 2!
Take on the minigames you know and love, now with a whole new layer of hardcore challenge and replayability!

THOSE GAMES EXTREME is a new, more challenging THOSE GAMES experience. Enjoy flashier attacks, animations, and stage gimmicks for more excitement and drama than ever!

Featuring new versions of THOSE GAMES staples, all with updated visuals, including Pin Pull, Number Tower, Color Lab, Knock-Back Shooter, Draw & Guard, and Spellbinding Scroll (now upgraded to Survival Scroll!).

Are you ready for the hardest instalment in the THOSE GAMES series yet? Are you ready...for THOSE GAMES EXTREME?!

Key Features
・A new instalment in the THOSE GAMES series, with a focus on higher difficulty.
・Features familiar minigames with updated visuals for a fresh new look.
・Enjoy bite-sized gaming challenges to your hearts' content, with 155 stages across six different minigames!
・Compete against other players from around the world in Rank-Up Challenges.
・Use the coins you earn in-game to get plates and titles from the Gotcha! machine.
・Combine plates and titles to create and customize your own Title Plate.
・View global leaderboards updated every month in Latest Rankings.
・Complete a variety of different missions to earn rewards.
